resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105681</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105681</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fire Management, Everglades National Park</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feuer-Management, Everglades Nationalpark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gestion du Feu, Parc National d'Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gerência Do Fogo, Parque Nacional De Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gestione Del Fuoco, Parco Nazionale Di Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαχείριση πυρκαγιάς, εθνικό πάρκο Everglades</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Gerencia Del Fuego, Parque Nacional De Everglades</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes how fire is used to maintain the biological diversity and natural processes of the pineland, prairie, and other ecosystems of the Everglades that are shaped by the interaction of fire and water.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt, wie Feuer benutzt wird, um die 
biologische Verschiedenartigkeit und die natürlichen Prozesse des 
pineland, des Graslandes und anderer Oekosysteme des Everglades 
beizubehalten, die durch die Interaktion des Feuers und des Wassers 
geformt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit comment le feu est employé pour mettre à
jour la diversité biologique et les processus normaux du pineland, de
la prairie, et d'autres écosystèmes de l'Everglades qui sont formés
par l'interaction du feu et de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve como o fogo é usado manter a diversidade
biológica e os processos naturais do pineland, da pradaria, e dos 
outros ecosystems do Everglades que são dados forma pela interação 
do fogo e da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive come il fuoco è usato per effettuare la 
diversità biologica ed i processi naturali del pineland, del prairie 
e di altri ecosistemi del Everglades che sono modellati 
dall'interazione di fuoco e di acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει πώς η πυρκαγιά χρησιμοποιείται για να 
διατηρήσει τη βιολογική ποικιλομορφία και τις φυσικές διαδικασίες
του pineland, του λιβαδιού, και άλλων οικοσυστημάτων του 
Everglades που διαμορφώνονται από την αλληλεπίδραση της 
πυρκαγιάς και του ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe cómo el fuego se utiliza para mantener 
la diversidad biológica y los procesos naturales del pineland, de la 
pradera, y de otros ecosistemas del Everglades que sean formados por 
la interacción del fuego y del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206269</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105681</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/fire-management-everglades-national-park</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
